summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5827 for the improvement of Beacon Avenue, from Spokane Street to 39th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76797 as amended by Ordinance Nos. 76992 and 76856, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
